title: Elon Musk wants McDonald's to accept dogecoin for payment
text:
https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1485953263040188416The price of dogecoin DOGEUSD rose 7% on Tuesday, according to CoinMarketCap. 

Tesla TSLA and McDonald's MCD representatives didn't respond to requests for comment. 

The tweet comes after cryptocurrency prices—including dogecoin—have fallen sharply in recent days. The selloff prompted McDonald's to tweet on Monday: “how are you doing people who run crypto twitter accounts.”

An expanded version of this report appears on WSJ.com.

Also popular on WSJ.com:

Fidelity, once stodgy and adrift, bets on the Reddit crowd.

SAT changes will make exam shorter, simpler and digital.
